Object.Description: A wand that casts a simple fire spell.
A wand that emits bolts of pure force.
A wand that fires power bolts.
A wand that casts a strong missile.
A wand that shoots dark eldritch energy.
A wand that casts a strong fire spell.
A wand that casts a bolt of pure magic force.
A deadly wand that channels magefire from the nether planes.
A fearsome wand that fires bolts of penetrating death magic.
A mysterious wand of otherworldly origin, imbued with the purest of arcane energies.
A wand of demonic enigmas, cloaked in darkness and crackling with dark enchantments.
A centuries-old wand of great power, heralding long-destined destruction.
A great golden wand of the heavens, created by angels to wreak justice on the slayers of the innocent.
This strange weapon was used by ancient battle mages to deter invaders. The secret to its construction has long been lost.
A bow mounted on a stock that shoots with amazing speed and accuracy.
A bow made from the rare greywood tree.
A high-quality bow made of magical ironwood.
A bow that shoots arrows that burn with an unholy fire.
A bow that somehow manages to shoot two arrows in different directions.
A slow but powerful crossbow with a good grip.
A bow gifted to mortals from the gods themselves. It shoots powerful arrows in three directions at once.
A highly effective bow fashioned of still-living magical springwood.
A powerful bow crafted by dryads and blessed by the spirits of the woodlands.
A runed bow steeped in the dark power of ancient injustice.
A diamondwire bow used by guardians of the unseen ethereal shrines.

Bleeding Equipment

Object.Description: A katana capable of cutting a razor-thin line.
An ancient katana with a blade of jet black steel.
A beautiful katana, forged and cooled by the mists atop a great mountain.
A mighty weapon wielded by a hero from long ago.
A cruel blade forged in hell flame and blood.
A mighty katana with a crystal eye embedded in the hilt.
One of the legendary great blades of the master Ichimonji.
An evil blade that hungers for blood.
A magnificent legendary blade which only cuts those who deserve death.
A skull of the Dark Knight's minions, it has been morphed to be worn by a hero.

Object.id: Onyx Shield of the Mad God

Object.Description: A stout sheath of leather enchanted to duplicate swords.
A worn down sheath given to the students of most swordsmen.
A reinforced sheath held by lead commanding Samurai in lesser divisions.
A highly decorated sheath covered in gold leaf.
A legendary sheath cast from purifying argent metals.
A sheath corrupted by the blood of countless wicked demons.
A sheath created by gods of light and dark to protect against the chaos that threatens them.
A sheath crafted from the hide of the fabled Qilin monster, made to holster the blade of the finest swordsmen known in history.
A cloak that causes insanity upon it's wearer. Only the strong willed can handle this cloak.
A armor that seals dark souls away from the underworld by the gray gem engraved in the plate.
Anyone that owns this armor may morph into a fish....well thats useful :3
Not only does it gather the power of water, it uses it to emit a burst of courage and strength
An amulet that does not surrender to any opponent.
A wand that sends an elctric blast to your victims.
No scepter has ever been so powerful, this scepter was enchanted by Zeus himself.
A rare armor found in the depths of erupting volcanoes.
An armor said to have been found in the tallest tower of the realm. This tower is said to be where Oryx's father resides.
A quiver banished from every kingdom due to it's unthinkable power.
All adventurers who wear this ring tend to go on great journeys..but never come back.
A wand that holds all of the power from the elemental ruins and can be used to emit these powers and destroy evil.
A rare amulet that is made of a yellow crystal found in the Elemental Ruins
A holy tome of elemental prayers.
A staff that binds our reality to another.
Its so good, it's wierd. P.S Just look at that sprite doe! amazen ~Dark
Inspired by the design of the Grand Sorcerer robe, this robe will keep you uplifted in battle and plus it's comfy!
A dagger that will slice through diamond.
Strangely enough this staff isn't fully constructed and isn't too safe for use. The ancient Geb once had this staff but decided to get rid of it by destroying it because of it's weak power.
Hard armor that is nearly impenetrable.
The bow that were used by ghostly apparitions from the dark underworld.
A wand that is enabled to protect the civilizations of the people.
A potion that permanently increases attack and vitality.
It was only then that the world knew the earth was at end....
Scorching heat will emit across the battlefield when using this bow. It's been thought that only the sun gods would have such a weapon.
A potion that permanently increases dexterity and speed.
The opposers will be judged without mercy.
A dagger that emits energy from the sun by solar power.
A ring formed by red shiny crystals and golden edge, but also enchanted by an evil wizard...(Extremely good ring 10/10 would buy ~MSellers
A species of Magical Giants hide is strong and tough, but when in the weather of the Doomlands it can freeze and become indestructible.
A very heroic sword used by the great Darkfalcoo to slay evil fagits in the dark.
Oh look, we can retexture items just like Kabam. Man we must be FUCKING special huh. We're like the coolest fucking kids on the goddamn block huh?!
Zero wanted for some strange reason. No wonder why he makes 0s in class Hahahahahaha..ha.
A great sword of recognition, forged by the gods for the champions of cool.
An armor found in the lost catacombs where the skeleton king resides.
Well-crafted armor decorated with a set of large spikes across its chest and shoulders.
A strong, lightweight suit of armor crafted from the hide of the Phoenix God.
A bejeweled robe weaved with fire garnets and the featherweave of the Phoenix God.
A refined-steel set of plate mail embodified and rejuvenated by the essence of the Phoenix God.
An ancient golden sword, which once bestowed only to the most powerful of paladins.
A superior shield forged in deep armories for the construct armies of the underworld.
A holy armor blessed in the ancient paladin's shrine.
A wand that stops the darkness, a wand that creates destruction, and a wand that can be a nice night light too! To sum it up, its very useful.
This dagger was a myth, will you live to tell the tale?
A violent orb, this item will create massive devastation upon it's opponents. The bearer may not be able to escape it's power, or will his allies.
A wonderful robe used by the best of the best. All the mages want one!
Pestilence is an auroa around this skull, the user is bound to die. (Skull boost surrounding players' life.)
A ring that will cause sickness and death.
Unholy death is only bound the be the cause of using this staff.
I am so honored that i got such an expensive jewel...I will surely not die with it.
Tell the truth you evil creature! You cant handle the truth!
An enormous, flawless spinel set in a stunningly beautiful gold ring.
An enormous, flawless topaz set in a stunningly beautiful gold ring.
An enormous, flawless emerald set in a stunningly beautiful gold ring.
An enormous, flawless ruby set in a stunningly beautiful gold ring.
An enormous, flawless sapphire set in a stunningly beautiful gold ring.
An enormous, flawless onyx set in a stunningly beautiful gold ring.
An enormous, flawless citrine set in a stunningly beautiful gold ring.
An enormous, flawless amethyst set in a stunningly beautiful gold ring.
You can't run, nor can you hide.

The upper arms are protected by pointed, layered metal rerebraces which sit nicely under the shoulderplates. The lower arms are covered by vambraces which have a curved animal bone attached to each outer side, the bone curves upwards towards the shoulder.
Link's wonderful sword that he uses to do the spiral attack.
A Hylian shield that Link used to go rescue Zelda or some shit.
A strong tunic that is even worthy of a knight to bear.
A nice, cool ring that Link would wear. SO SHOULD YOU!
A great sword of fall, forged by the gods for the champions of autumn.
Hey GP, this is for you man!P.S fri soda pls im so thirsty
snowballs are fun and so are snowman in fact this is basically a better frostbite but i rather frostbite i will bite u ~omni
It's cold outsiiiide! no really its freezing hue
I am so honored that i got such an expensive jewel...I will surely not die with it again
An armor made of sapphire jewels and encrusted with a metal charged with fury.
A sword the will uncover the secrets that no one has discovered before in over a decade. It is the only key to salvations and must be used wisely.
Formed from the inner soul and from down earth even its aura of meaning will not only create a vast fog but will destroy your spirit.
The center of the soul is the place that combines essence of death,life,body and soul and shouldn't be disturbed. The controllers have warned you.
I couldn't say it enough, the mortals that have attempted to enter ALL been slain. All of them. Let me say this...you have been warned. ~Gaerian, Controller of Power

Object.id: Last Armor of the Final Decision
Object.Description: I would have to agree with Gaerian, this is an insult to Sidon and we will not allow this to happen and all intruders will be eliminated, once again the warning will not be repeated. ~Yikoen, Controller of Intellect.
A powerful ring, will cause the wearer to become chaotic.
The ground will tremble, the world will shake, and the power will surge.
The tail of Doge, please nerf.
It's even better than before, or not who knows.
Doge is very mad that you ripped all of his swaggy fur off and used it for yourself!
A wonderful pendant that Doge wears sometimes when he goes out to get his Swag hat..
Scooby Doo, where are you! No really, where are you??
I've heard stories about the Nightbringer, and they all were never good.
A handful of astoundingly durable traps designed to painfully impede movement on foot.
This trap doesn't go too well with magical gear...
An accursed sword that feeds off of rage and desperation.
Fast-acting and infamously lethal poison pressed from the Haloflower seed.
A darksome, garnet orb that steals weeks of life from those who peer into its core.
A striking helm built by messengers of the underworld, its design amplifies the wielder's shouts tremendously.
A titanic warhammer that takes powerful energy to swing, but rocks the Earth with each strike.
A colossal bludgeon favored by oni, it is as powerful as it is unwieldy.
A spell created to hold a calamitous inferno within time, unbinding the temporal locks unleashes a fraction of its destructive power. WARNING: Fatigue may be caused after use of this spell.
A bow of unreal magnificence, stringed with a near-invisible wire to fire arrows of pure light.
A spined dagger that is designed to remain on the ground if it fails to hit its target.
A wand built to help suture areas of riven time during the creation of the universe.
A Armor of the Leader on the Rock Realm has been forge to fit only the best warrior that can defeat the mighty Golem and be the mighty warrior that has Defeated the Lord.
A sword that honors the great king of the...fallen kingdom.
The power is aboundant in this seal of truth and justice!
An armor that resist pain of any source, it was formulated by the hands of the king's workers...they died.
An extremely large yellow jewel to mark the wonderous king that was but never will be.
A key which opens the entrance to the Elemental Ruins.
A key which opens the entrance to the Hidden Temple.
A cloth made from the robes of liches that reside in the Undead Lair, and then a purple gem was super-glued onto it.
A staff that holds some nice looking, dangerous, radioactive material. I'd advise not eating it.
A cyclop god's eye got ripped out and you have it or you're wearing it.
The Kami Kage must have left his other robe in the wardrobe and someone took it. It's yours now.
An extremely red katana that burns through anything by touch.
Made from strong material that originates from another universe. It's quite scarce.
A key that opens the entrance to The Unspeakable.
A scroll that will allow you to teleport straight to a quest. Use with caution!
A scroll that will make you very fast for 8 seconds!
A scroll that will upgrade all of your stats except for life and mana!
A scroll that gives you berserk for 8 seconds!
A scroll that will heal a groups' health fully!
A scroll that will max a groups' magic points fully!
A scroll that will cause any surrounding enemies to be paralyzed and will give yourself damaging for 4 seconds!
A scroll that will make a whole group be invisible for 3.5 seconds!
A scroll that can be used for a random amount of fame!
A scroll that will increase both life and mana!
A nice sharp katana made by nice fairies.
A bow that will leave you with no regrets.
A leather armor that will protect you from interdimensional demons from the beyond.
A blade of otherworldly power that will bend reality with every strike.
A ring of that is made of wood but a forever living flame has been set on it. It won't harm the wearer.
A shield that will shock enemies on contact!
Slowly, but surely his bow will drain their life away just as he did.
A scroll that will remove a groups negative effects!
A scroll that does nothing, but it's feed power is quite excellent!
A scroll that will give a group armored!
A scroll that will give surrounding enemies dazed for 2 seconds!
A scroll that will will heal both your health and magic at once!
Ugly Sprites, Swag Luts, FUN PARK!.
There is plenty of fun in having fun with the fun you'll have with a fun hat!
A spell of silent energy that will vanquish all entities in it's blast radius.
A scepter that renders a whole army useless.
A legendary seal that emits a dim but pure light, granted only to souls deemed by the Gods to be fated to salvage the Realm.
An armor that is slightly heated because of the lava that is sealed inside of it's plates.
I left the wand in the fridge.
A teradiuos material found only from a far land is what this bow is made of.
Nigh-unbreakable golemsteel armor enchanted to withstand nearly any strike.
This armor looks like it was sprited by a kindergartener...Yes, it was Omni.
You can cut your grass with this.
A treasure from the Sprite World.

EffectInfo.description: Can be used to obtain 25 gold.

Object.Description: A treasure from the Sprite World.

EffectInfo.description: Can be used to obtain 50 gold.

Object.Description: A treasure from the Undead Lair.

EffectInfo.description: Can be used to obtain 25 gold.

Object.Description: A treasure from the Undead Lair.

EffectInfo.description: Can be used to obtain 50 gold.

Object.Description: A ring that was found in the hidden chest from the Lair od Draconis.
The scepter before the Scepter of Fulmination.
The ring before the Experimental Ring.
The wand before the Conducting Wand.
A graceful shuriken that spins faster as it travels.
A powerful trap that releases a huge amount of tiny barbs, designed to tear at wings and ground flying beasts.
This key opens the entrance to The Stronghold.
This key opens the entrance to the Concealment of the Dreadnought.
A sword made of the hard and sharp plates of the Dreadnought himself.
A grand robe found deep in the treasures of the place where the Dreadnought was locked away.
A sheath made of materials that will uplift the fighter when a katana is drawn from it.
A robe that will reflect light off into different colors.
A extremely rare crystal found nearby a Mysterious Crystal.

EffectInfo.description: Can be used to obtain 250 gold.

Object.Description: An ancient frozen armor that has a ring of unbreakable ice attached to it.
A reskinned hydra. Nothing too special. Except the sprite...and it doesn't drop.

Once the end of a halberd wielded by the legendary shadow cult leader, who's said to have captured demons in the darkest depths of hell, this blade is imbued with an unknown and sinister power that is as unwieldy as it is destructive.

This mysterious armor is worn by the ritualist leader during their sacrificial ceremonies. It seems that it's been imbued with the power of the Dark Shadow, perhaps due to the blood spilled upon its metal.
Nobody knows where this stone comes from, but they do know that it grants the holder immeasurable power, akin to god. Perhaps this was a gift from the Dark Shadow...
This shield is almost transparent, as if it's not truly a part of this world. Formerly wielded by the Dark Shadow, it will crush any fool who dares to oppose its bearer.
Customize your Samurai with this Robobuddi skin! From the GoodDeal Good Pack!
Customize your Ninja with this Experiment7 skin! From the GoodDeal Good Pack!
Customize your Ninja with this Kunoichi skin! From the GoodDeal Good Pack!
Customize your Knight with this Crusader skin! From the GoodDeal Good Pack!
Customize your Wizard with this Unknown skin! From the GoodDeal Good Pack!
Customize your Assassin with this Pyramid Revenant skin! From the GoodDeal Good Pack!
Customize your Rogue with this Chemist skin! From the GoodDeal Good Pack!
Customize your Paladin with this Good Hobo skin! From the GoodDeal Good Pack!
Customize your Warrior with this Swordsman skin! From the GoodDeal Good Pack!
Customize your Necromancer with this Funcromancer skin! From the GoodDeal Good Pack!
Customize your Samurai with this Hero skin! From the GoodDeal Good Pack!
Customize your Mystic with this SpookySpasticSpistical skin! From the GoodDeal Good Pack!
An item used to transfer fame between players.

EffectInfo.description: Can be used to obtain 50 Fame!

EffectInfo.description: Can be used to obtain 100 Fame!

EffectInfo.description: Can be used to obtain 500 Fame!

EffectInfo.description: Can be used to obtain 1000 Fame!

Object.Description: A staff empowered by energies that were only obtainable from ancient relics in tall tales but happened to be true.
A quiver that rearranges enemy's faces and makes them look even more ugly than they were.
Such hazardous material should be handled very carefully...SIKE
Armor that has been conjured by the best magician out of the whole kingdom.
A slimey wand that shoots goo in order to make the enemies go shoo.
A potion that only gives 5 minutes of loot drop but is also tradable.
A delicious apple that gives you super good buffs and makes you proph like.
A staff that will make you laugh daily when you handle it.
A small lethal blade created by shards of ancient metals from the Hidden Temple.
This key opens the entrance to the Heavenly Rift.
A ring that will give you the strength of the undead on your side.
The most effiecient type of cloth to resist dying from undead forces, other than holy defenses.
This key opens the portal to the Catacombs..think before you do this.
This sword was dishonorable when used in battle because of it's great power.
The best nunchucks around, they make you very mobile.
Wear this around your waist and you will certainly feel unstoppable.
A key which opens the entrance to the Dojo.
A tome that will make you become plenty more powerful than your enemies.
You can shank enemies and mutate them too!
A wand that helps a user predict the future and ward off monsters.
A material used to enchant. It is a shiny purple stone.
A material used to enchant. It is a shiny light blue stone.
A material used to enchant. It is a shiny red stone.
A material used to enchant. It is a shiny yellow stone.
A material used to enchant. It is a glistening gray stone.
A material used to enchant. It is a shiny pink stone.
A material used to enchant. It is a shiny dark blue stone.
A material used to enchant. It is a dark green piece of tough rubber enfused with magic.
A material used to enchant. It is a pink mineral that can only be found from the Mad Spriter.
A material used to enchant. It is small remains of a phoenix.
A material used to enchant. It is small remains of a Dark Knight.
A material used to enchant. It is blueish mineral enfused with energy and enlocked with enchantment.
GP Where you at when we need you?
A shield painted with red and cool looking stylish fashion. It's also very useful.
A green blade with a small purple handle. It definitely feels weird to the touch. You feel hyper...
You will have this bow as long as you do what the king orders you to do.
A very light piece of armor but quite tough as well. Great for any quest.
It really is quite simple. Put this trap down and all your problems will fade away!
A ring fit for a ruler.
2 sides of the problem is that it's a total issue to have twice the stupidity!
A weird looking disc that just so happens to appear near catastrophic events.
Not usually a staff used in war, but what the heck.
A shield painted with blue and cool looking stylish fashion. It's also very useful.
A fiery robe of cloth straight from the Lair of Shaitan.
A dark seal that is said to be cursed. I would stay away from it.
A darker wand not meant to be released into our world, dangerous to use.
The skull of a dark skeleton king. He was slayed by the last generation of RotMG players and was replaced with the Pumpkin King.
A massive skull taken from a fallen cyclops, it is graven with many passages of death scriptures. Provide aid from a distance.
A key that opens the entrance to the Cornfield of Peril.
Food for your pet. Tart and tangy.
Food for your pet. Buttery and delicious!
Food for your pet. Nice and sweet honeyglazed ham.
Food for your pet. Straight out of the oven.
It's blade cursed by the haunting evil that remains from the underworld.
An enchanted amethyst gem sits in the middle of this helmet.
Armor that is quite resistant to magical attacks.
Evil will arise in your soul upon you when using this ring.
Wear it and grow another leg, and arm, or just die...
A crossbow that destroys foes and crushes it's enemies within seconds.
Katana assigned to be used by the guardians of the Genisus but were banned from being used due to the weapon having a mind of it's own.
A sword of that you must weild furiously and with courage; taken under the the ownership of Seus -- lost forever after his death.
Molten lava spills from the wand as you conjure energy from this wand, use with caution
Violently bright but soothingly yellow jewel that sits on an iron ring, charged with loads of energy.
A darkened dagger with an emerald jewel in the middle of the blade. It's a popular dagger but hard to retrieve since few merchants sell them because of material of the blade.
Created from Genisus shards and assembled by the blacksmith that also resided in the Genisus until he was killed by Oryx because of the creation of this powerful weapon.
Dark spirits influence the prey of this bow. In the wrong hands this weapon is fatal.
A key that opens the entrance to The Crypt of the Fallen.
The trident once wielded by poseidon himself, a powerful weapon now among the realm. The current warrior who now wields this weapon shall live again and conquer the world.
A grayish robe with blue gems lined straight in the middle. Each gem harnest power to keep the wearer resilient and strong.
An ivory curved sword that shoots blast of holy light.
Showing no mercy, shows power. We must begin our lead in the realm. The true rulers of this world, show yourself. ~Odem, Controller of Fortitude
Fading away from reality is what keeps the darkness persisting to devour all of us. We can only do what is possible to stay away from this Void.
Using this item gives you 500, 1000, 1500 gold.

EffectInfo.description: This item drops from weekly loyalty packages.

Object.Description: Shiny, tough armor with sapphire lined in the middle of it's plates. This armor is used by the most worthy.
You can kill once, but you can't die twice. ~ Nirux
A key that opens the entrance to Aldragine's Hideout.
A ninja star that is modified to be thrown at extreme speeds.
The mind is a valuable thing to have, until it's corrupted. ~ Nexus Crier
A time will come that Aldragine will gain enough power and destroy our world. You must stop this.
The wrath wasn't certain before..now we know why.
Not only us can be killed by the hands of men...
A explosion of zol will be released on the use of the scepter.
The great Oink master is back.
Delicious bacon is good at all times! I don't like my bacon burnt so don't burn it or I'll be extremely sad.
A mystery that will never be solved.
This relic can be shattered. Once shattered it causes the mortal to have the intellect of the gods.
This relic can be shattered. Once shattered it causes the mortal to have the reflexes of the gods.
This relic can be shattered. Once shattered it causes the mortal to have the power of the gods.
This relic can be shattered. Once shattered it causes the mortal to have the fortitude of the gods.
This relic can be shattered. Once shattered it causes the mortal to have the strength of the gods.
This relic can be shattered. Once shattered it causes the mortal to have the endurance of the gods.
This relic can be shattered. Once shattered it causes the mortal to have the quickness of the gods.
This relic can be shattered. Once shattered it causes the mortal to have the recovery of the gods.
A complex tide hurls and keeps the mind at ease.
You can't break us. We can only shatter you.
Time will cause suffering that can't be healed by change. ~ Azar
What's your future or better yet..what do you want it to be?
A hard iron futuristic bow that shoots energy projectiles at unbelievable speeds.
Yes! Adventures await us young warrior! You must fight with valor and and might. ~ Itani
A key that opens the entrance to the Prison of Time.
The contradiction can sometimes become deadly, control it wth your life.
Is it pure power or just another cure?
Don't believe them when they say you'll become a demon. We are your friends not your end.
A smooth bow created from the legs of a terrifyingly large spider. It still twitches, as though it is not quite dead yet.
A trap woven by a beautiful spider. Its intricate patterns create a beautiful, yet deadly trap.
A hide armor that got infested with spiders. Egg sacs are still present, but the spiderlings never harm the wearer.
A large fang taken from an enormous spider. This token fills its wearer with a dark, mysterious power.
Become a machine of the heavens, and strike down the unholy!
This is a joke and it's my death, wanderer. Kill me and see how long you live to tell the others.
First is thirst..and now your essence belongs to me.
Dark mages destroyed and cursed the lands of peace and now they remain lifeless forever.
It's like I've got a cold..but I just can't stop coughing. Please help.
The evil, wicked papercut now kills your enemies! Inflict them with the hated papercut!
You need it or do you just want a free car?
I'M GONNA STAB YOU! with a smile.
You see the bark wood but don't get splinters.
By your will, I will slay.
On the other side there is nothing but deceit and hatred.
Hiding isn't the answer, face it.
The devourer must not be awakened once again or our world will tear and shatter to pieces.
Our worlds will be consumed if we don't fight back.

A staff that is made out of marvelous cystal and has been crafted into a rhombus shape, which has been decorated with bright, jagged crystals that give off a soft humming sound whenever magic is used.
An armor made from hive material with strong sturdy wings attached to the back.
A sword made from polished bee stinger.
A key that opens the entrance to The Hive.
Spooky times happen underwater my buddy.
A key that opens the entrance to the Abandoned Basement.
That moment when you can't think of a name.
A blade forged by the magic of necromancy and a curse from the evil undead.
A seal that grants a shield of impenetrable light and energy around you.
A dark spear of evil; pierces through the souls of it's enemies.
The dead won't be dead anymore.
A benevolent blade enchanted by necromancy.
Your fate lies within your weapon in times of war.
A spell made from Dark Elven Wizards of Agnaztir; a lost kingdom.
An amulet that will resurrect you upon your death.
Think about it..if we become a god, there's no way they can strike us down! ~ Ranu
A corrupted vestment awed for its magical properties, but feared for its ability to break the wills of the weak.
A robe that promotes swift movement and god-like life essence never before seen.
You can now cut the cheese!
They say the prowess of Ajax was matched only by the champions of the gods.
An already known power increased to it's maximum potential morphed to be handled by mortals.
Technology is overcoming magic these days, I swear. ~Odaru

EffectInfo.description: An orb of power that grants wisdom boost, orbits the player and explodes. Deals 800-1200 armor piercing damage.

Object.Description: A peculiar cloak that gives one the composition of chiseled marble.
The book used to aid the gods; the book present at the creation of the universe.

EffectInfo.description: Spawns a beacon that heals players close to it. Amount of health it heals increases at a steady rate over time.

Object.Description: An armor made of cloth with some orange lines on it.
A prism that leaves behind 2 time-void blasts from the power of a mystic's orb.
A peridot prism meant to lure unsuspecting souls into the underworld, but seems to have weakened over time.
Is it me or did that weapon just move by itself?
A key that opens the entrance to the Galactic Plateau.
All you do is talk man, you need to shut up sometimes.
We can hear the faint screams of the dead...one of them almost sound like...me. ~Scheez
This shield was a seal used to keep the Dark Knight from breaking into our world; ripping apart the fabric of reality.
A common find in the Galactic Plateau.

EffectInfo.description: Can be used to obtain 2 gold.

Object.Description: Um..Mr.Alien, mind helping me put this on?
Equipment that the Overseer uses to keep the blasters shiny and clean.

EffectInfo.description: Can be used to obtain 125 gold.

Object.Description: You even feel like an alien!
A cloak surged with unlimited godly energy.
Prototype armor made by some very smart aliens. I assure you they know what they're doing. A bit bulky though.
Customize your Archer with this Marksman skin! From the GoodDeal Good Pack!
A scythe that will rip through enemies like they're only a sheet of paper.
Odd valuable currency that has been sought out for decades by wise merchants.

EffectInfo.description: Used to buy legendary items or other items.

Object.Description: A key which opens the entrance to the Storm Palace.
A key which opens the entrance to Crimson Showdown.
Our army will always move forward; we shall make our mark. ~Vardon, the Remembered
The end will be forever if we don't stop this war. ~Vardon, the Remembered
The great sword used by the Dark Knight to obliterate all in his way.

Object.id: Evil Shield of the Dark Knight
Object.Description: A shield that sometimes moves by itself, as if it was living.
Powerful, and quite uplifting ironically. This armor was meant for true knights.
Once worn it can't be contained. Instead the user will be consumed and be controlled by the dark evil that is held within.
This is definitely a crappy reskin of EP. It's garbage looking and you know deep inside you'd rather a regular EP.
A katana used by the great samurais of the realm. The blade is quick wide and sharp.
A ring of made of ancient stone which holds a gemstone that is said to grant much power.
Sturdy armor with a cape attached to it worn when going into an intense battle.
The only sword that can be used to take down a god. It's true potential can only be activated by a true warrior.
When I grow up...I wanna be an astronaut! Just so I can go in uranus!
A neccessary helmet for going out to space.
A hide made of magma rock and the forged by the will of Hades.
A shield from a place beyond the gates of war and peace.
An astronomically heavy katana. It is forged from dark matter.
Cut from a fallen star, a deep purple emanating an unearthly glow, hinting at the power fused within.
A hide from the fierce beast Garutious.
An uncommon crystal found in the mountains; holds a source energy and power.

EffectInfo.description: Can be used to forge a Legendary Sor Crystal.

Object.Description: An uncommon crystal that has been charged into a powerful shard of pure ascendant energy.
Just drop your yellow rock in this magical strange capsule and it will transform into a useful item! DISCLAIMER: Causes instant spookitis.
Just drop your yellow rock in this magical strange capsule and it will transform into a useful item! DISCLAIMER: Causes instant spookitis.
Just drop your yellow rock in this magical strange capsule and it will transform into a useful item! DISCLAIMER: Causes instant spookitis.
A key which opens the entrance to the Tunnel of Pain.
Using this item gives you 12, 14, 16, 18, or 20 onrane.

EffectInfo.description: This item only drops from Final Fabled Bosses.

Object.Description: A key that opens the entrance to the Keeping of Aldragine.
A key that opens the entrance to the Crimson Caverns.
Tales have said that the Far-Ranger was able to slay 3 infernal beast at once..
The legends shall die, and the hero will turn.
I've never made a deal with the devil before...Power comes with a price.
A staff that uses the magic of the ghouls and demons that lurk in our world.
The coat that the devil wears when he is in human form.
A set of cards that have accidentally been exposed to dark and powerful energies from magic rituals.
An ironwood quiver used by harbinger elves to relay messages of impending destruction and ruin.
The entities that have been corrupted by the Zol never come back the same.
A wicked corrupted force must be stopped..
Sidon will do anything to capture the immortal beast..
The power of the nexus must be saved..
Their reign has come to an end..
A key that opens a portal to the Gauntlet. Only able to open in the nexus!
A standard banner made of wool cloth.
A banner meant to inspire the greatness of nature.
A banner used by heroic templars.
This banner can cause vicious beast to flee in fear.
Zarcod, a fallen kingdom won't be crushed..This banner proves that.
This banner represents true war and battle.
A machine infused with dark energy that sends a pulse of shadow particles into the sky.
Customize your ninja with the Baby Djinja Skin.
A wand will cause infinite fire to emitted on the opponent and that opponent will bother you no longer!
Customize your ninja with the Mini Rosen Skin.
Customize your priest with the Mini Geb Skin.

A lance made of the finest steel, it easily breaks through enemy formations.
A lance that fills its wielder with the resolve and courage to face even the most dauntless monsters.
A lance that has been lost in another dimension
A lance that appears to be old but extremely sharp.
A strong sturdy lance made of enchanted red iron.
A strong sturdy lance made of enchanted dark iron
A lance that strikes with the might of an ent god.
The gem in the middle of the lance makes the lance surge with incredible power.
A masterfully crafted lance made of the strongest metal imaginable, charging with it fills bystanders with determination and awe.
The holders of this lance will not take a defeat and will fight for what's theirs.
A basic siphon that can hold a standard amount of power.

A bracelet with Sor gemstones placed in it.
A page that belongs to the book of Zaragon, the magic god of the Blood Mountains.
A red banner that stands for no mortal.
Ancient robes that have been drowned in the blood of holy gods.
A bracelet with a gemstone placed in it made out of pure crystalized Zol Energy.
A rare battery needed to use the Sor Forger. (Only necessary when using gold to forge!)

EffectInfo.description: Needed to use the Sor Forger when using gold to forge.

Object.Description: Using this item gives you 80 gold.

EffectInfo.description: This item drops from realm events.

Object.Description: Activating this mark raises your base defense by 20%.
Activating this mark raises your base vitality by 20%.
Activating this mark raises your base wisdom by 20%.
Activating this mark raises your base speed by 20%.
Activating this mark raises your base attack by 20%.
Activating this mark raises your base dexterity by 20%.
Activating this mark raises your base wisdom, vitality, defense, speed, dexterity, and attack by 1.
Activating this mark raises your base wisdom by 25%, and dexterity by 25%.
A wicked staff that brings about a sensation of emptiness, but whispers occasionally seep forth from the darkness.
In order to unbox you need at least two onrane. This lootbox opens tiered reskins, scrolls, outfits, skins or a legendary item.
In order to unbox you need at least two onrane. This lootbox opens tiered reskins, scrolls, outfits, skins or a legendary item.
This package can be opened for free. This package gives you onrane caches, gold, a marksman skin and the rare fabled Bracelet of Torment or Master Eon.

EffectInfo.name: The Zol Awakening
EffectInfo.description: This package only drops from tier 2 parts of raids and up.

Object.Description: This package can be opened for free. This package gives you scrolls and a chance to receive a Sor Crystal or the rare currency named Onrane.
A katana made of valuable ivory metals wielded by the worthy.
In order to unbox you need at least two onrane. This lootbox opens tiered reskins, scrolls, outfits, skins or a legendary item.
A long lost artifact recovered by Davy Jones, believed to have been cursed by the gods of the seven seas themselves.
A key that opens the entrance to the Crypt of the Illusionist.
A branch taken from the Tree of Life, enchanted with an emerald source-stone to enhance its powers.
The souls of woodland creatures are channeled through this scepter. It occasionally flaps its wings wildly.
Woven from living plants, these robes hold the knowledge of life itself.
Warm to the touch, this trinket fills its wearer with the bulwark of nature.
Your sanity collapses on itself as you wear this jewel.
In order to unbox you need at least two onrane. This lootbox opens tiered reskins, onrane, pet food, skins or 1 of 2 legendary items.
In order to unbox you need at least two onrane. This lootbox opens tiered reskins, scrolls, outfits, skins or a legendary items.
This looks like it could be tasty.
It can be eaten but you might be able to make it better..
Would be a good addition to something..but you can still eat it.
Crack it open and let it slide right down your throat.
Something is cooking in the kitchen, I just don't know what yet.
Something is cooking in the kitchen, still just not sure yet.

Object.Description: THATS ONE BIG ASS BURGER MY HOMEFRY.
THATS ONE BIG ASS BURGER MY HOMEFRY.
A shield of true unholy power found in the Catacombs.
If you've got the munchi eat the crunchi TM.
What will I do with this?
A scepter that contains mystical abilities borrowed from the energy of time itself.
A simple blueprint for making a turret out of spair materials.
A blueprint for making a basic turret.
A blueprint for making a slightly more advanced turret.
A blueprint for making a turret out of organic materials.
A blueprint for making a strong turret made of seashells and coral.
A blueprint stolen from malphas, that describes how to create a demonic turret.
A blueprint for a turret that creates projectiles from light itself.
A blueprint for the ancient turrets of the catacombs.
Drops all legendary gear! LIMITED TIME!
Some say that an actual star was captured out of space and put into this wand.
The evils I have done can't be concealed forever.
A hide enchanted by a similar spell used to enchant Yazanahar.
A lance that invokes the greatest fears of your the most fearless minds.
This box drops premium utilities and skins!
Some say that an actual star was captured out of space and put into this wand.
The evils I have done can't be concealed forever.
A tome that holds the ancient writings of the Crimson Caverns. Thanks to: Dreadion
A large sword made out of the strongest and lightest metals from the Lands of the Phoenix God.
This helmet was used in the Battle of the Titans, centuries before Oryx's Reign.
This armor was forged in the Eternal Crucible for the allied giant nations nearby.
Although lacking the ability to make one immortal, this amulet will make you be able to stand up to most foes.
A gigantic bracelet worn by Garnet. Wearing this makes you feel like you can strike down anything. Thanks to: Png
A gigantic bracelet worn by Jade. Wearing this gives you comprehension to unknown energies . Thanks to: Png
A weird wand. If put in the wrong hands it can destroy entire worlds.
The shattered blade of a celestial envoy, this crested lance is with bound with a presence that drives it to lead it's bewinged hearlds beyond the stars themselves.
A seal crafted by a society meant to keep an unthinkable monstrosity behind the doors of this world.

EffectInfo.description: -200 HP upon use. This seal hardens you to comeplete stone for 2 seconds and gives allies invulnerability.

Object.Description: A sparkly venom that emits a magical light.
An armor forged utilizing gargoyle stone, various metals, and its enchanted gargoyle stone placed in the center.
A gicantic mace made of gargoyle stone plates. The pure crush of this mace cripples it's victims.
A commodity among those who work in the shrines, this charm is used to train novices in the arts of exorcism.
A charm integral to holy shrines that fear their 8 legged foe, this charm poses the valuable ability to ward off and conjure spiders.
A warding charm blessed from a forest mage, complete with an enchanted ruby placed in it?s center, It?s a must have for those who frequent the forest.
A charm engraved from the slab a of magical birch, forbidden from entrance by the fae, it?s wielder will gain their assistance as long as they hold its possession.
A charm carved out from a warped diamond, it holds a deep connection with the world enough to raise golems from it?s earth.
A charm that despite it?s foreboding name is used to protect those influenced by demons from the far corners of the abyss.
A charm reserved for those of high nobility, made from blessed cloth and layers of golden feathers.
A vile, foul smelling charm used by those who practice the unholy art of raising that which should not be raised.
A potion that permanently increases your might.
A potion that permanently increases your luck.
A ring that seems to bring you great fortune.
This armor is has that razzle dazzle shine to it.
Customize your gambler with the RNG Clown Skin.
A standard dice that any gambler can utilize.
Seems like a regular dice but seems to glow just a bit.
This dice tends to roll on 6 a lot.
A warm dice that seems to let you control the spin of it's roll.
It seems to have a mind of it's own.
A dice created from the stone found from the mountains where the gods abide.
A dice that embraces the power of the night.
The dagger used to sacrifice red demons to Sidon.
This bow is sturdy and is very good for archery, especially when killing goblin mages.
A ring that shocks the energy of a storm god into it's user.
A helm made of legendary platinum material and sapphire spikes. This helm links with your allies to give them power.
This lootbox can give pet stones, items that change the skin of your pet to a premium pet skin!
A necklace with the a cursed skull attached to it.
A skull that drains life energy away from large hordes of creatures and causes the land they reside in to corrupt..
